DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of enoxaparin on bleeding and venous blood clots in patients with hip fracture surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Japanese Safety and Efficacy Study of Enoxaparin in Patients With Hip Fracture Surgery
DOC.criteria: femoral neck inside or outside fracture any major surgery on lower limbs within 3 months clinical signs of deep vein thrombosis use of nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs severe hepatic disease or renal insufficiency
